experiment_name: A De Novo Metalloenzyme for Cerium Photoredox Catalysis
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:approx. 23 °C;    reaction_ph:8.5;    reaction_other_conditions:100 µM metalloenzyme (PLZ1.0: dimer concentration;     PLZ1.1–PLZ1.4: single-chain concentration), 100 µM CeCl3 (1 equivalent per protein scaffold), 410–420 nm (3 W) irradiation, 24 h reaction time, aerobic conditions, 10% (v/v) acetonitrile co-solvent, protein and CeCl3 pre-incubated for 2.5 h at 40 °C;    reaction_substrate_concentration:2 mM
